name: Twin Pillars of Ice
effectText: Special Summon 2 "Ice Pillar Tokens" (Aqua/WATER/Level 4/ATK 1900/DEF 1200) in Defense Position, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn after this card resolves. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 WATER monster. You can only use each effect of "Twin Pillars of Ice" once per turn.
